steps.step: In a pan, put the sweetened condensed milk, butter, and semisweet chocolate.
Stir gently over low heat until the brigadeiro doesn’t stick to the bottom.
Pour the brigadeiro in a big bowl and chill in the refrigerator for 4 hours.
With a spoon, unstick the corners of the the brigadeiro.
With buttered hands, remove the big brigadeiro and shape into a ball.
Roll the big brigadeiro in chocolate sprinkles and serve in a shallow plate.
